name: Miss Valentina
description:

Valentina is such a sweetheart. Every inch of her dress was designed using vintage antiqe remants. Valentina looks extra sweet wearing her favorite piece of Hair Candy ** A Gigantic repurposed hairbow, and glittery black licorice colored ballet flats. Your girl will fall in love at first sight!

name: Lexington
description:
Calling all Queens- gather around the throne as Lexington hails as Queen of all thing Blue and enchanted.

her dress captures the sunlight with brocade gold,bronze and shimmer. a center cluster pink and torquoise blue  silk,satin ribbon makes this handcrafted couture dress a head tuner, her delicate brocade crown adds glam and repurposed dollie legwarmers complete the look . vintage pearls

we fell madly in love with our very first Blue dollie and so should you!
18'polyfil this doll is not recommended for children under 3 years of age
2-3 weeks shipping
no doll will ever be exactly alike but all are equally as gorgeous

name: Tallulah
description:
Tallulah is a vintage couture rag doll with a cute as ever braided up do and loves wearing feathered halo's. Her sweet little wool heart shaped lips are never hard to miss.
She wears a fabulous tutu dress bodice made of antique lace finds all stitched by hand.
 Tallulah was born Fabulous and is every little girls dream dollie,a fun photo prop,and she's also a stunning collectors item.Heirloom quality!


18'' tall. Polyfill stuffed. This doll is not recommended for children under 3.
2-3 weeks shipping
all clothing handstiched from vintage findings and remnants.
